name: Sniper Ghost Warrior 3 - Sniper Rifle McMillan TAC-338A
name_original: Sniper Ghost Warrior 3 - Sniper Rifle McMillan TAC-338A
description: Feel the power of this legendary rifle and test your sharpshooting skills on the field. Fitted with the McMillan Long Range Scope, the McMillan TAC-338A rifle will be the prize of your sniper equipment.
